attributes.action: Relax the gun law to responsible persons
attributes.additional_details: It is time for the government now to relax the the gun laws in this country instead of the wasted time in checking licence on renewal it should just be a matter of paying your fee and it being renewed the police have all the information needed and can see if that person has been in trouble so they can act on it but if they have no marks against them why do they need go through all that process again it would free up time and cost less money
